thread.title: BRIEF-Apollo Investment Corp Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Apollo Investment Corp Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.03‍​
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Apollo Investment Corp:
* APOLLO INVESTMENT CORPORATION REPORTS FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* APOLLO INVESTMENT CORP - ‍NET ASSET VALUE PER SHARE AS OF END OF QUARTER WAS $6.60 COMPARED TO $6.72 AS OF SEPTEMBER 30, 2017, A 1.8% DECLINE​
* APOLLO INVESTMENT CORP - NET INVESTMENT INCOME PER SHARE FOR THE QUARTER WAS $0.16 COMPARED TO $0.16 FOR THE QUARTER ENDED SEPTEMBER 30, 2017‍​
* APOLLO INVESTMENT CORP - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.03‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
